text: Will there be a second COVID-19 surge in Illinois? These are the stats to watch.
Summer is over in Chicago before it even began: City cancels Lollapalooza and other festivals
Top cop strips officer of police powers, moves him to administrative tasks following obscene gesture at protesters
Lightfoot says Chicago’s COVID-19 budget shortfall at least $700 million: ‘That’s a sobering number’

Cubs’ Anthony Rizzo shows off his new look — now 25 pounds lighter with the help of a Florida-based trainer

Midwestern cities continue to lose population. Two of the fastest-shrinking are in Illinois.
